pullRequest.title: [FLINK-18862][table-planner-blink] Fix LISTAGG throws BinaryRawValueData cannot be cast to StringData exception during runtime
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is the purpose of the change
When using LISTAGG with retraction, the result type of LISTAGG is not correctly inferred. The result type should be STRING, but is RAW type, because we didn't override ListAggWithRetractAggFunction#getResultType. This is mainly caused by FLINK-16996, because we automantically inferred the BinaryStringTypeInfo with BinaryStringTypeInfoFactory.
Brief change log

override getResultType  and getAccumulatorType for  ListAggWithRetractAggFunction and ListAggWsWithRetractAggFunction returning StringData type info.

Verifying this change

added testListAggWithRetraction integration tests.
